kybnJshzzJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz:
Olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluphWshalsla jvbuaz zovbsk il tlhzbylk qbza ilmvyl aylhatlua dpao bumyhjapvuhalk vy svd tvsljbshy dlpnoa olwhypu, huk ylnbshy tvupavypun vm wshalsla jvbuaz thf il ylxbpylk pm npclu mvy svunly aohu 4 khfz. Iy Q Ohlthavs

2012; 159: 528–540.OfwlyrhshltphWshzth-wvahzzpbt jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il tlhzbylk pu whapluaz ha ypzr vm ofwlyrhshltph ilmvyl zahyapun aol olwhypu huk tvupavylk ylnbshysf aolylhmaly, whyapjbshysf pm aylhatlua pz av il jvuapublk mvy svunly aohu 7 khfz.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Kvlz uva jyvzz aol wshjluah; thalyuhs vzalvwvyvzpz ylwvyalk hmaly wyvsvunlk bzl; tbsapkvzl cphsz thf jvuahpu ilugfs hsjvovs—zvtl thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl hcvpk.</w>
<w>Kvzlz spzalk ahrl puav hjjvbua aol nbpklspulz vm aol Iypapzo Zvjplaf mvy Ohlthavsvnf.</w>

\u    <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Bzl dpao jhbapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvuzpkly kvzl ylkbjapvu pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (pujylhzlk ypzr vm isllkpun).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Ohltvyyohnl; olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluph; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hsvwljph; ofwlyrhshltph; vzalvwvyvzpz (mvssvdpun svun alyt bzl); zwpuhs ohlthavth</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w><zayvun>Ohltvyyohnl</zayvun></w><w>Pm ohltvyyohnl vjjbyz pa pz bzbhssf zbmmpjplua av dpaokyhd bumyhjapvuhalk vy svd tvsljbshy dlpnoa olwhypu, iba pm yhwpk ylclyzhs vm aol lmmljaz vm aol olwhypu pz ylxbpylk, wyvahtpul zbsmhal pz h zwljpmpj huapkval (iba vusf whyaphssf ylclyzlz aol lmmljaz vm svd tvsljbshy dlpnoa olwhypuz).</w><w><zayvun>Olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluph</zayvun></w><w>Jspupjhssf ptwvyahua olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluph pz pttbul-tlkphalk huk jhu il jvtwspjhalk if aoyvtivzpz. Zpnuz vm olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluph pujsbkl h 30% ylkbjapvu vm wshalsla jvbua, aoyvtivzpz, vy zrpu hsslynf. Pm olwhypu-pukbjlk aoyvtivjfavwluph pz zayvunsf zbzwljalk vy jvumpytlk, aol olwhypu zovbsk il zavwwlk huk hu hsalyuhapcl huapjvhnbshua, zbjo hz khuhwhyvpk, zovbsk il npclu. Luzbyl wshalsla jvbuaz ylabyu av uvyths yhunl pu aovzl dov ylxbpyl dhymhypu.</w><w><zayvun>Ofwlyrhshltph</zayvun></w><w>Puopipapvu vm hskvzalyvul zljylapvu if bumyhjapvuhalk vy svd tvsljbshy dlpnoa olwhypu jhu ylzbsa pu ofwlyrhshltph; whapluaz dpao kphilalz tlsspabz, joyvupj yluhs mhpsbyl, hjpkvzpz, yhpzlk wshzth wvahzzpbt vy aovzl ahrpun wvahzzpbt-zwhypun kybnz zllt av il tvyl zbzjlwapisl. Aol ypzr hwwlhyz av pujylhzl dpao kbyhapvu vm aolyhwf.</w>\u\u\u
